content: Hello! I believe I have not yet used any of my late days for 6.100A and so I would like to use my three late days for this last problem set. I am planning to finish the problem set sometime in the next few days and then complete the problem set four checkoff by the end of the day Monday. I was wondering if I needed to email anybody to confirm and use my late days? Thank you!
subject: Problem Set Four Extension

content: No need to email, it will get applied automatically!
